hero.title: Expert Private Tutoring, Personally Curated by Elizabeth Burrows
hero.subtitle: Founded on trust. Built on results. Delivered by experts.
hero.description: For over fifteen years, Elizabeth and her team have provided world-class educational support to ambitious families. From key entry points such as the 7+, 8+, 11+, and 13+ through to GCSEs, A Levels, the IB and Pre-U, our tailored tuition ensures each student receives the highest level of academic guidance.
hero.videoPlaceholderAlt: Elizabeth Burrows introduces My Private Tutor Online

schoolShields.sectionTitle: We help students place at top 10 UK schools and universities

aboutSection.title: Expert Private Tutoring, Personally Curated by Elizabeth Burrows
aboutSection.subtitle: Founded on trust. Built on results. Delivered by experts.
aboutSection.description: At the heart of My Private Tutor Online is a singular vision: academic support that is both exceptional and deeply personal. Founded in 2010 by Elizabeth Burrows‚Äîa Cambridge-accepted educator and former Forbes journalist‚Äîthe company began not as a business, but as a trusted network of elite colleagues she met throughout her international tutoring career.
aboutSection.continuedDescription: What started as a circle of personal recommendations has since evolved‚Äîorganically and exclusively‚Äîinto one of the UK's most respected names in specialist private tutoring. As testament, My Private Tutor Online is honoured to be featured in Tatler's Address Book and recognised as School Guide UK's 'Top Pick' for private tuition.
aboutSection.finalDescription: Today, the ethos remains the same: every tutor is handpicked, every match thoughtfully made, and every family accommodated directly by Elizabeth and her team.

trustIndicators.sectionDescription: Our reputation speaks for itself - from royal endorsements to Tatler recognition, we deliver results that matter.

studentJourney.sectionSubtitle: From First Enquiry to Outstanding Results
studentJourney.sectionDescription: Our proven 5-step process ensures every student receives the personalised attention they deserve, leading to exceptional academic outcomes.

steps.title: Initial Enquiry
steps.description: Get in touch with our educational consultants to discuss your specific needs and academic goals.

steps.title: Personalised Assessment
steps.description: Comprehensive evaluation of current knowledge, learning style, and areas for improvement.

steps.title: Tailored Learning Plan
steps.description: Custom curriculum designed specifically for your needs, with clear milestones and objectives.

steps.title: Expert Tutoring
steps.description: One-to-one sessions with our Oxbridge-educated tutors using our interactive online platform.

steps.title: Outstanding Results
steps.description: Achieve your academic goals with proven grade improvements and enhanced confidence.

testimonials.sectionSubtitle: Discover why parents and students trust us with their most important educational goals. Real testimonials from real families.

testimonials.quote: The transformation in our daughter's confidence and grades has been remarkable. From struggling with mathematics to achieving A* grades, the personalised approach made all the difference.
testimonials.author: Lady Catherine Wellington

testimonials.quote: As featured in Tatler, My Private Tutor Online represents the gold standard in educational excellence. The calibre of tutors and results speak for themselves.
testimonials.author: The Hon. James Pemberton

testimonials.quote: Our son went from predicted C grades to achieving A*A*A at A-Level. The Oxbridge preparation was exceptional - he's now reading Natural Sciences at Cambridge.
testimonials.author: Mrs Sarah Fitzgerald

services.sectionDescription: Comprehensive educational support tailored to your child's individual needs, from Key Stage preparation to Oxbridge entrance.

services.title: GCSE Excellence Programme
services.description: Intensive GCSE preparation with proven track record of grade improvements. Our expert tutors guide students through exam techniques and subject mastery.

services.title: A-Level Mastery
services.description: Advanced level tutoring for students aiming for top universities. Subject specialists ensure comprehensive understanding and exam success.

services.title: Oxbridge Preparation
services.description: Elite preparation for Oxford and Cambridge applications. Interview coaching, entrance exams, and application strategy from experienced Oxbridge graduates.

results.sectionDescription: Our track record speaks for itself. Real results from real students who have achieved their academic goals through our personalised tutoring approach.
